name: MIS Disabilities Breakdown
description: HQ9007 v1.0 This report outputs Prisoners with Disabilities Breaking down by establishment(s) or Area(s).

dataset.name: Query
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE_DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.GENDER_CODE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE = 'DISAB' AND BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.STATUS = 'ON' AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.GENDER_DESCRIPTION IN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Gender Description:','A','Physical Characteristics\Gender Description',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)) GROUP BY BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE_DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.GENDER_CODE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT CODE_DESCRIPTION, CODE, GENDER_CODE, AREA_DESCRIPTION, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: instance.report[0].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child,parent-child-section
instance.report[1].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child,parent-child-section
